title: Quit Playing Games
lyrics: Even in my heart I feel you're not being true to me deep wi thin my s oul I see , nothing's like it used to be Sometime's I wish I could turn back time Im possible as it may seem but I wish I could so bad , baby Quit playing with my heart ( quit palying games with my heart...) with my heart ( before you tear as apart ) with my heart ( quit playing games with my heart...) with my heart Is should have knowm from the start.... Baby, baby, the love that we had was so strong can't keep on hang ing on forever oh baby baby , this is not right let's stop this tonight
